name: Distraction Machine
storyline: Welcome to Island City, a society where much has been destroyed fighting the undead, with the most powerful communities hoarding all but scraps. A small cyclepunk community has managed to survive, scavenging through the abundance of discarded bicycles across the city to create weapons, tools, equipment, and more.
summary: In Distraction Machine, the player becomes their community’s Distractor, a warrior bard and "pied piper of the undead" who lures zombies into traps with music, but also distracts their community from the gloom and doom, motivating them to fight another day.
